website_summaries.verdict: Peppermint and lemongrass smell mixes with the citronella oil to create a clean-burning pleasant-smelling natural bug repellent.
pros: Does a good job of repelling mosquitoes on the patio or other area
cons: Designed to burn about 30 hours, which is about half of the time you could count on some other brands to burn

customer_reviews.title: Maybe works on certain mosquitoes?
customer_reviews.text: I'm in California. And those mosquitoes with the black and white stripes weren't afraid of it. They're like black Hawks. Just choppering in and sucking me dry. The tiny ones. Those ones did stay away. But those black and white guys seemed unfazed.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Simple, functional. What else do you need in a candle? Are you a blood thirsty mosquito? If so, this product is NOT for you. Works well on repelling pesky fruit flies too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Smell amazing and actually work
customer_reviews.text: These smell so good!!! And they work!!! I would almost just want to use them for the smell. If you love the smell of essential oils you will find this candle heavenly. Seems expensive but they are not when you see how big they are and how slow they burn. And how well they work! Mosquito's LOVE my husband, and they stayed away from him when this was burning!
customer_reviews.author: juliaf

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t work for mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: I sat a couple inches away from this candle for 15 minutes and was bitten several times by mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You get what you pay for and Amazon has a better price than in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has a great price on these. Normally you would pay $10-$12 each at the store. Which for that price it is not worth it. They are still a little expensive for what you get but they do work well. I wish they were a little less money because then I would use it more. But Now are use them sparingly to try to get the most out of them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: A nice smelling candle, but absolutely useless against mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two candles for a road trip through the Wind Rivers of WY, Glacier NP in MT, and a trip down the Pacific Coast. I wasn't surprised when these didn't work against the hoards of bugs in Wind Rivers, not even reapplying 90% deet on a regular basis worked. But then when in the mountains of WA where there were only a few mosquitoes around, not only did the candles not repel, 2 mosquitoes flew in to the candle wax and died. Can't believe it actually attracted the damn bugs! Giving it two stars still as the scent and the ambiance of the candles are enjoyable, but don't expect them to repel a damn thing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great mosquito repellent & Smells great too!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! I subscribed to these candles because I loved them so much. They did help keep the mosquitoes away. I used the candle combined with their spray on natural mosquito repellent and we barely saw mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMay

customer_reviews.title: Keep the mosquitoes away.
customer_reviews.text: I am leary about buying candles online. I have asthma and most scents bother me. These do not have a chemical smell, and they didn't trigger my asthma. The best part was the mosquitoes stayed away and the patio smells pleasant. We live near orchards that are flooded and mosquitoes are terrible. So we can't go outside on the nice nights without being eaten alive.
customer_reviews.author: Razorhawk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected. For some reason my workshop is swarming with mosquito this year, never had prior years, go figure. The coil type worked well. Wife complained over smoke and smell. Tried this and it did not work as well as advertised. Ordered new coils and am seeing better results now. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Relief In A Can!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase so many things from Amazon and too many review requests, with that being said- These candles are small but have the bug fighting power of a barrel of regular citronella! Mosquitoes in my area this year are relentless! Our yard was sprayed but lightning one of these candles 2 feet away not one bite! Not to mention they smell great! No headache no bites!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was not impressed, didn’t work and it doesn’t smell good either
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of the smell of these. It almost has an asian medicine smell to it, but not the good kind. Also when I tried them out to see if they work against mosquitos, they didn’t. I had a candle set under the table and within minutes, I was already bitten.
customer_reviews.author: Amac

customer_reviews.title: Will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. These are the most fragrant citronella candles I have ever purchased. I actually moved them away from the table as they are powerful. I am impressed with how long the candle lasts. I will definitely purchase these again next summer.
customer_reviews.author: bottletree123

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Sqeeters Away
customer_reviews.text: These are a tad expensive so I hesitated buying them. But I was fed up with the cheap candles that don't keep the blood suckers away. These candles are worth their price. They keep the bugs away and the smell is nice. They last a long time. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling but burn quickly
customer_reviews.text: I think these smell really great and seem to work well. However, they burn very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wells

customer_reviews.title: They smell nice enough.
customer_reviews.text: Its a candle. It smells nice enough, considering its meant to ward off annoying pests. I like the can. It burns nice and evenly. Not sure if it scares away the skeeters, though. I was hoping to see thousands of them falling to their death. Maybe I need a bigger candle.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Bugs away candle
customer_reviews.text: Verily nice fragrant and effective candle to keep away bugs in my patio. Just love it
customer_reviews.author: prabha v

customer_reviews.title: Not for country mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: You see those blurs mid screen? No? Well that’s a swarm of mosquitos huffing the candles. I don’t know if country mosquitoes are tough and these candles are for city mosquitoes, but I’m sitting between those little dudes and got 5 bites just writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice but doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: The bugs were actually flying around the candle and landing in it. It’s like the candle was attracting them more. And I lit the candle he suddenly had a swarm this happened a couple times to us so I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed it seems to work so well
customer_reviews.text: I have never found anything but DEET really effective against mosquitos: Off, candles, citronella torches. However, I have found these candles to work very well. I was surprised. I'll definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Attracts more so than repels.
customer_reviews.text: Albeit this candle smells great, it more so attracts mosquitos than repels. Mark Twain of candles.
customer_reviews.author: NSW12

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep  Mosquito away
customer_reviews.text: Murphy's Naturals Mosquito Repellent Candle | Made with Essential Oils did not keep the mosquito's away. Not worth the money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: No mosquito in Alaska
customer_reviews.text: We took them to Alaska to burn in our camper they worked great we had no insects in the camper I would recommend this to anyone traveling and camping in any area
customer_reviews.author: victoria helmandollar

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Use this in my garage and sometimes outside to keep the mosquitoes away👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Gizzmoman

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: The candles smell great and do pretty good job at repelling most mosquitoes. The thick wick also does a good job at staying lit. Note: if you live in an area with a lot of mosquitoes like I do it won’t repel all of them but there is a very noticeable difference
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Candles smell good
customer_reviews.text: Candle were a little smaller than I had imagined but smell good
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mosquitoes away!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this product seems to work. Most nights I light around dusk and have had no mosquito problems. It smells really nice. The can is thin and you may burn yourself if not handled carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Cat 7

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I'm not a big fan of the citronella scent in general but it does it's job. Every time I sit outside with the candle, it keeps the mosquitoes away. I live in Hawaii in the mountains where we have lots of them, and the candle really works.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Burns

customer_reviews.title: Kinda works
customer_reviews.text: The smell is pleasant. I found it only repelled mosquitos if you’re sitting right next to it. The candle does last a long time so I guess it’s good value for price, but for a larger area, you’d need like 50 of these candles so you might as well get a thermacell and not have to deal with open flame altogether.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: All natural, but not effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. I liked that they are all natural and the scent is good. But I literally had both of them RIGHT next to me and mosquitos landed on me (on more than one occasion) Unfortunately, they are not effective and, especially for the price, I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: The best mosquito repellent I ever purchased, used since the beginning of the season and will last until the end
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Kept the bugs away.
customer_reviews.text: Works and has a much better scent that a chemical repellant.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do squat.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't help, at all. Put 2 on my patio table and the skeeters ran us inside.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times on our patio and did nothing to prevent mosquito bites! False claims.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: seems to help, of course it doesn't eliminate all mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: seems to help, of course it doesn't eliminate all mosquitoes
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Great camping candles
customer_reviews.text: Great candles for camping. Even though they are smaller and more expensive than most repellent candles these are our new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best mosquito candle ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We were having mosquito issues in our backyard and these two candles on the table are just about the only thing that worked! These candles are the best. Smell good...they’re strong...but they work! Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a replelint
customer_reviews.text: childs play to a mosquito, buy this if you want to pay them to frustrate you!
customer_reviews.author: For Your Consideration

customer_reviews.title: these smell great!
customer_reviews.text: We took these camping as an alternative to lanterns and to hopefully dissuade some bugs from visiting. While these didn't protect against mosquitoes, they smell wonderful and would be a great addition to a porch, campsite, or picnic outdoors. They're holding up to their 30-hour burn time as well!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna M

customer_reviews.title: Kills Covid-19
customer_reviews.text: I will use them outside, the stuff in these candles kills Covid-19... they were definitely big in size I wasn’t expecting
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O'CONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it really works but smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if it really reduces the bugs but it really smells nice
customer_reviews.author: WWM

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work very well. Placed both of them next to me on my porch, and still was killing misquitos on me after 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Smell is strong but pretty pleasant. I burned it 20 mins before it got dark, not one bite. I use both candles in the pack on my deck just to be safe and ppl move around dont want them confined to just the table area.
customer_reviews.author: Ebone'

customer_reviews.title: It's works!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine how surprised we were when they really, really worked. We are impressed! We will buy them again and will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great natural candle for repelling mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great candle for fending of the pests.... light scent and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There’s a string licorice smell which I hate, but would be worth it if it kept the mosquitoes away. Unfortunately the radius of effectiveness is only about a foot.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Got to repel the mosquitos. Nice scent but the mosquitos kept coming.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love - smells great, lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable in small places
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! You can tell they are natural because they don’t smell like chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Reed

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works I haven't been bitten one time since I lighted it up
customer_reviews.author: remy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but no match for the massive dinosaur mosquitoes of the Northwood’s!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Shilts

customer_reviews.title: Was good, not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: These candles used to be amazing, but ever since ordering again, they don't stay lit and don't keep mosquitos away. Maybe it's a bad batch, but not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Damien Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, I’ve bought several of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work, smell good.
customer_reviews.text: We were camping in late August in NH - not super hot or muggy, and these seems to keep mosquitos away in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Chase away bugs.
customer_reviews.text: They help with the bugs and smell good. They also burn a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I can sit on my deck again-
customer_reviews.text: My backyard is a mosquito haven. I have tried a lot of products— and nothing works. I absolutely LOVE this candles. They smell great and work!!! Thank you Murphy’s Naturals!!
customer_reviews.author: VeggieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Look for other options
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but it's not a good sign when I have two candles on either side of me, lit for 2+ hours, and still have mosquitoes coming around and landing on me. Terrible. Look at other options for mosquito control.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Smell really good!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not entirely sure on its effects as a repellent but I will say that it does smell really good.
customer_reviews.author: Saul W Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Great smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles...they smell so wonderful and help with those pesky mosquito 's!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Works! Really put to test and works
customer_reviews.text: Was spendy but proved to be worth the money. But definitely not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra I.

customer_reviews.title: Quite Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Scent is a little string but BOY does it work. I just lit a single candle and left it in front of my open patio door and had zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: N. Coffie

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of the candles will definitely purchase again! Like that they are more natural product. Shipping to get her was slow.
customer_reviews.author: jw48

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: The container was smaller than a normal citronella which I liked. The smell of the candle is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent and it kept the mosquitos away!
customer_reviews.author: molly gorman

customer_reviews.title: love the scent
customer_reviews.text: it seems to be effective. need more candles to cover larger area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t seem to work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t seem to really work, but the mosquitos have been bad in my area all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, do not work
customer_reviews.text: They do not work at all. We even put them about 5 inches from our legs and mosquitoes will still bite.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: does not burn long enough
customer_reviews.text: I've only burned the candles for two hours and one is almost gone. Very disappointed for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: Murphy’s always a great brand!
customer_reviews.text: Small but powerful! Help so much here in South Texas. Smell nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Draw your own conclusions.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. I’m not sure if it works or not. Not willing to test the night without it.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Wick won’t light
customer_reviews.text: Candle wick stop lighting after a few times using it :( wanted to like this bc it’s natural but it’s a no-go!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so very pleasant. No insect bites whatsoever! works better than cutter!
customer_reviews.author: JSAdediji

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used both candles on a very small patio and was still bitten constantly. This product did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Morris

customer_reviews.title: Help a little
customer_reviews.text: Puts of a nice smell, might help a little if you burn 3 - 4 at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Murphy's Naturals Mosquito Repellent Candle | Made with Essential Oils and a Soy/Beeswax Blend | 30 Hour Burn Time | 9oz | 2 Pack
feature_bullets: FIERCELY EFFECTIVE: Our high essential oil concentration that provides powerful mosquito protection with up to 30 hours of burn time
SIMPLE, ALL- NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Rosemary Oil, Peppermint Oil, Citronella Oil, Lemongrass Oil, Cedarwood Oil, Soybean Oil, Beeswax
LIGHT, REFRESHING SCENT: Our essential oil blend creates a pleasant, refreshing fragrance when burned
RESPONSIBLY SOURCED: Our candles are made in the USA and use responsibly sourced ingredients
ENJOY LIFE OUTDOORS: Whether you are enjoying dinner on your patio, camping, or watching the kids, our Murphy’s Naturals Mosquito Repellent Candle will help you Enjoy Life Outdoors!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars454 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
